mapper.select: select incharge_name as name, count(incharge_name) as num from contract where date_format(business_date,"%y%m" )=date_format(now(),"%y%m" ) group by incharge_name order by num desc limit 5
select emp_Kname as name, sum(manu_tocount) as num from productstatus group by emp_Kname order by num desc limit 5
